version_description:
1.0.12
- SocialGest is now on English and Spanish, more languages on the way!
- Access to support chat added also on app login.
- Bug fix that wasn't allowing to post on Facebook with images when an account or fan page haven't previously created an album.
- Multiple visual tweaks and improvements on reliability, performance and speed related to device.

SocialGest 1.1.0 Release Notes:

- Overall app redesign.
- All web app actions now available (View, Delete, Edit, Repost, Pause, Resume, Comment and Approve posts).
- Images preview window available inside Messenger and Calendar when clicking thumbnails.
- Informative window inside Messenger related to image resolutions that are allowed to post with SocialGest
- Improvements on reliability, speed and performance.

SocialGest 1.1.1 Release Notes:

- Overall app improvements on reliability, speed and performance.
- Multiple images uploading:
Instagram carousel feature, now you can upload up to 10 images on one post (All images must be square sized).
Facebook album uploading up to 25 images on one post.
Twitter image posting up to 4 images on one post.
- Fixes bug that wasn't allowing users to complete registration.
- Fixes bug that wasn't allowing users to add LinkedIn accounts.

SocialGest 1.1.2 Release Notes:

- Overall app improvements on reliability, speed and performance.
- Multiple images uploading:
Instagram carousel feature, now you can upload up to 10 images on one post (All images must be square sized).
Facebook album uploading up to 25 images on one post.
Twitter image posting up to 4 images on one post.
- Fixes bug that wasn't allowing push notifications to show.

SocialGest 1.1.3 Release Notes:

- Overall app improvements on reliability, speed and performance.
- Multiple images uploading:
Instagram carousel feature, now you can upload up to 10 images on one post (All images must be square sized).
Facebook album uploading up to 25 images on one post.
Twitter image posting up to 4 images on one post.
- Fixes bug that wasn't allowing some users to register.

SocialGest 1.1.4 Release Notes:

- Overall app improvements on reliability, speed and performance.
- Now you can upload video (high upload speeds recommended) and login with Facebook and Google
- Multiple images uploading:
Instagram carousel feature, now you can upload up to 10 images on one post (All images must be square sized).
Facebook album uploading up to 25 images on one post.
Twitter image posting up to 4 images on one post.

- Visual improvements
- Added reminder about Instagram in instant posts
- Bug fixes

- General Bug fixes
- New app-wide bottom navigation menu
- New calendar top navigation menu

- Fixed a bug that caused a crash in the app's first launch
- Fixed a bug that prevented users from getting push notification token automatically
- Fixed a bug that blocked publications from changing status.
- Fixed a bug that blocked users from editing instagram publications

- Fixed a bug that impeded users from using Facebook as a login
- Fixed a bug that afected publications edit in the calendar
- General fixes
- Added a Shopping Cart to obtain Socialgest Pro plans

- Fixes in push notifications.
- Fixes in application.

* Nueva versión de SocialGest.
* Corrección de errores en carrito de compras.
* El carrito de compras se cambió al menú lateral de la aplicación.
